Trump shooter had a social media account; purchased 50 rounds of ammunition: Details
content: ​The account was rarely used and there was no post indicative of the attack. "It was rarely utilized, has not been used in months, and we have found no evidence that it was used to plan this incident, promote violence, or discuss his political views," the spokesperson said. "Discord strongly condemns violence of any kind, including political violence, and we will continue to coordinate closely with law enforcement."
summary: ​The account was rarely used and there was no post indicative of the attack. "It was rarely utilized, has not been used in months, and we have found no evidence that it was used to plan this incident, promote violence, or discuss his political views," the spokesperson said. "Discord strongly condemns violence of any kind, including political violence, and we will continue to coordinate closely with law enforcement."

After coming within 1/8th inch of death, a reflective Trump turns a corner in life
content: Mostly combative and forceful, Trump turned contemplative about the narrow escape he had while speaking to two journalists on Sunday, signaling what could be a profound, life-changing moment in his turbulent career.
summary: Mostly combative and forceful, Trump turned contemplative about the narrow escape he had while speaking to two journalists on Sunday, signaling what could be a profound, life-changing moment in his turbulent career.

title: Secret Service chief Kimberly Cheatle, DEI ‘hiring’ slammed after Trump’s assassination attempt
content: The incident has also cast a spotlight on Cheatle’s efforts to promote diversity within the agency. In a previous interview with CBS News, she emphasized the importance of attracting diverse candidates and providing opportunities for everyone, particularly women. The Secret Service aims for 30% of its recruits to be women by 2030.
summary: The incident has also cast a spotlight on Cheatle’s efforts to promote diversity within the agency. In a previous interview with CBS News, she emphasized the importance of attracting diverse candidates and providing opportunities for everyone, particularly women. The Secret Service aims for 30% of its recruits to be women by 2030.

title: Mystery around Donald Trump shooting: 3 things we don't know
content: After FBI identified Donald Trump's shooter as Thomas Matthew Crooks, a lot of information and disinformation have surfaced but there are more questions unanswered even 36 hours after the assassination attempt on Trump. Crooks acted alone and used his father's AR-15-styl rifle to shoot at Trump at the Pennsylvania rally. The bullets grazed Trump's ear while Crooks was shot dead.
summary: After FBI identified Donald Trump's shooter as Thomas Matthew Crooks, a lot of information and disinformation have surfaced but there are more questions unanswered even 36 hours after the assassination attempt on Trump. Crooks acted alone and used his father's AR-15-styl rifle to shoot at Trump at the Pennsylvania rally. The bullets grazed Trump's ear while Crooks was shot dead.

content: Israel's PM Benjamin Netanyahu has also acknowledged that there was "no certainty" that Deif had been killed. The Israeli military said its strike on Saturday aimed at Deif and Salama in "an open area" that was "not a tent complex, but an operational compound."​​

title: Trump assassination attempt: BlackRock issues statement, says shooter Thomas Matthew Crooks featured in ad
content: Thomas Matthew Crooks, who attempted to assassinate Trump at a Pennsylvania rally, appeared in a 2022 BlackRock ad as a Bethel Park High School student. Crooks, armed with an AR-style rifle, was killed by Secret Service agents. BlackRock removed the ad, condemned the attack, and will release second-quarter results amid scrutiny over gunmaker investments. Footage provided to authorities.
summary: Thomas Matthew Crooks, who attempted to assassinate Trump at a Pennsylvania rally, appeared in a 2022 BlackRock ad as a Bethel Park High School student. Crooks, armed with an AR-style rifle, was killed by Secret Service agents. BlackRock removed the ad, condemned the attack, and will release second-quarter results amid scrutiny over gunmaker investments. Footage provided to authorities.

content: Most of Europe has abolished compulsory military service. Now, faced with the threat from Russia, some countries want to bring it back.

title: North Korea: Kim's sister outraged by leaflets from South
content: Kim Jo Yong, the North Korean leader's sister, has called South Koreans sending balloon-borne leaflets over the border "scum." She hinted that the North might resume sending trash-filled balloons to the South.
summary: Kim Jo Yong, the North Korean leader's sister, has called South Koreans sending balloon-borne leaflets over the border "scum." She hinted that the North might resume sending trash-filled balloons to the South.
